description: Adds a statement to a topic's access control policy, granting access for the specified Amazon Web Services accounts to the specified actions.

parameters.name: TopicArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the topic whose access control policy you wish to modify.

parameters.name: Label
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the new policy statement.

parameters.name: AWSAccountId
parameters.description: The Amazon Web Services account IDs of the users (principals) who will be given access to the specified actions. The users must have Amazon Web Services account, but do not need to be signed up for this service. (string) ---

parameters.name: ActionName
parameters.description: The action you want to allow for the specified principal(s). Valid values: Any Amazon SNS action name, for example Publish. (string) ---
